== John Paulett ==

=== About Me ===
I am a 22 year old graduate student.  I started using Ubuntu with the Dapper Drake release, and made it my primary OS when Edgy was released.  I enjoy developing software and sharing techniques to try new things out in Feisty.

=== Projects ===
==== VCS Frenzy ====
Developer/Plugin Lead

A nice applet from PeteSavage for getting alerts when changes to certain version control repositories are committed.
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/vcs-frenzy/]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://code.launchpad.net/~johnpaulett/vcs-frenzy/trunk-jp|My Branch]]</nowiki>
